actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 for the purpose for raising the limitations on the amounts of insurance which may be obtained under such act.

summary.text: Amends the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to raise the limitations on the amount of insurance on residential, business, and church properties which may be obtained under the Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 for the purpose for raising the limitations on the amounts of insurance which may be obtained under such act.
